job.title: Software Engineer - Frontend
job.description: pWho Are WeppMemberSuite Inc is an enterprise Software Service SaaS company based in Atlanta GA With over 20nbspmodules our MemberSuite platform powers the back office processes for more than 100 medium and large associations and nonprofits providing order processing member selfservice and emarketingppbrppFor the past few years we have focused on increasing the horsepower of our product and now believe we are ready for the appropriate facelift to make our UI match our platforms capabilities We are lookingnbspfor an experienced Software Engineer to led the rebuild of our platforms User Interface to support and fuel our growth in the marketppnbspppWhat Youll DopulliDesign and implement the fundamentals of a UI framework to support future needsliliCollaborate on the UI design and UX with our team to produce a strong market toolsetliliDemonstrate strong communication skills to collaborate as full software team to move the platform forwardliliLead the front end team to share the responsibilities of the development and planliliMentor engineers early in their career to develop their skillsliliDesign and implement a testing environment to ensure reliability and confidenceliulpnbspppWhat Were Looking Forpulli4 years of experience producing and working with highend web interfacesliliStrong background in UI design methodologies and developmentliliExperienced in webbased technologies including HTML code CSS layout AngularJS JavaScriptjQueryliliKnowledge in programming and working with APIs and Restful Web ServicesliliWrite automated test suitesliliWork with product managers and designers to define the scope of each new feature  productliliGood communication Both written and facetoface communication is a key part of building a great productliliA Team mentality This role requires you to work and collaborate well with other engineers designers and those from other teamsliliPassion for learning new technologies and is quick to understand and use themliliDriven by results and delivering a highquality product to our customersliliPLUS Hands on experience with NET  CliulpnbspppWhat We Are OfferingpulliPaid Vacation and Flexible Work
